span.title: dateTime Type: A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month). If hours and minutes are specified, a UTC offset SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored. Dates SHALL be valid dates.

definition.value: The outcome of the procedure - did it resolve the reasons for the procedure being performed?

short.value: Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period. These are generally tracked separately from the procedure description, which will typically describe the procedure itself rather than any 'post procedure' issues.

definition.value: Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period. These are generally tracked separately from the procedure description, which will typically describe the procedure itself rather than any 'post procedure' issues.

description.value: ICD-10, SNOMED CT, Orphacode if rare disease is diagnosed

short.value: Device used to perform the procedure

definition.value: Device used to perform the procedure

short.value: Device(s) that is/are implanted, removed, or otherwise manipulated (calibration, battery replacement, fitting a prosthesis, attaching a wound-vac, etc.) as a focal portion of the Procedure.

definition.value: Device(s) that is/are implanted, removed, or otherwise manipulated (calibration, battery replacement, fitting a prosthesis, attaching a wound-vac, etc.) as a focal portion of the Procedure.

short.value: Additional information about the procedure

definition.value: Additional information about the procedure
